channel.title: [Misc] Infiltration - Game 1A - Round 22 - Apprentice Wins!
channel.description:
# PLAYERS
1. Marluxion 2. Apprentice 3. Zone_Q11 4. Silviu200530 5. pandagod
# ROUNDS
* [Round 1](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/misc-infiltration-game-1a-round-4-3-5-proximity-17-99/87770/2) * [Round 2 - Silviu and PG # FINAL SCORE
|**Player**|**DF1**|**DF2**|**DF3**|**Score**| | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | |Apprentice|10|6|1|25| |Zone_Q11|6|6|0|18| |Marluxion|4|1|1|9| |Silviu200530|0|0|0|0| |pandagod|0|0|0|0|

item.title: [Misc] Infiltration - Game 1A - Round 22 - Apprentice Wins!
item.dc:creator: Whysper
item.description:
Ahh yes, true. Though getting to the Executive Elevator and not using the Blackmail File would have gotten you 2 DF tokens at the end. Unfortunately some bad rolls towards the end.

Read full topic

I hard threw

Assembly Line

REVEAL

Increase the alarm tracker by 2.

DF [2]

TECH LOCK [5]

INTERFACE

Remove the interface token from this room to take 1 “Prototype” special card into your hand.
